member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.AutoDeconstructionGenerator
member.summary: Defines a source generator that generates deconstruction methods of a type.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.AutoDeconstructionGenerator.ExpressionPattern
member.summary: Defines the pattern that matches for an expression.
Get for assembly-targeted attributes on generation.
member.param: The target collection to store the results.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.AutoDeconstructionGenerator.GetForExtension(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.AttributeData[],System.String,System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.INamedTypeSymbol)
member.summary: Gets the raw code parts for extension deconstruction methods via the specified list of attributes data.
member.param: The attributes data, with the corresponding location.
The full type name, without the generic constraint.
member.returns: The collection of raw code parts for extension deconstruction methods.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.DisallowParameterlessNewInStructGenerator
member.summary: Defines a source generator that generates the source code that will disallow user using clauses to initialize an instance of types without any parameters in constructor.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.EnumSwitchExpressionGenerator
member.summary: Defines a source generator that generates the method and the corresponding values, forming a expression.
member.remarks: This source generator does not support generic types.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Diagnostics.CodeGen.Generators.AttributeDataComparer
member.summary: Represents a comparer instance that compares two instances via their own first arguments.

member.summary: Indicates the version of this project.
